document_data.name: ''Cloak of Charisma''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''cloak of charisma''''' was a [[magical]] [[cloak]] that made the wearer more likable and persuasive.
document_data.Description: ''Cloaks of charisma'' tended to be highly fashionable with a decorative [[silver]] trim. They were also quite lightweight.
document_data.Powers: The strength of the [[Item enchantment|enchantment]] on a ''cloak of charisma'' could vary quite widely, with more powerful ''cloaks'' being significantly more expensive. Minor ''cloaks'' would cost about 4,000 [[gold pieces]], moderately-powerful ''cloaks'' would cost about 16,000 gold pieces, and major ''cloaks'' would cost about 36,000 gold pieces.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Taluth]], a [[malaugrym]] active in [[Westgate]] in the years following the [[Time of Troubles]], possessed a minor ''cloak of charisma''.
